The Corrupt Lizardman is a monster fought in a cave at Mount Quidamortem during the Tale of the Righteous quest.

Like other lizardmen, this one will deal poison damage as well as its standard melee attack.

It can be fought in the Nightmare Zone after the quest is complete.

Fighting the corrupt lizardman.

The '''Corrupt Lizardman''' is a monster fought in a cave at [[Mount Quidamortem]] during the [[Tale of the Righteous]] [[quest]].

Like other [[lizardmen]], this one will deal [[poison]] damage as well as its standard melee attack.

It can be fought in the [[Nightmare Zone]] after the quest is complete.
[[File:Tale of the Righteous - fighting Corrupt Lizardman.png|thumb|left|300px|Fighting the corrupt lizardman.]]
